title: Shahia
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Fast food, Take-out, Middle Eastern, African, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small Middle Eastern and North African cuisine eatery. Meat is kept separate from veggie dishes. Has a vegan donner kebab, veggie steaks, tofu scrambled "eggs," falafel, vegan sausage and cheese, dips/spreads, salad, and soup. Ask for the separate vegan menu.
